actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Concurrent resolution authorizing a bust or statue of Martin Luther King, Jr., to be placed in the Capitol.

summary.text: Directs the House Joint Committee on the Library to procure a bronze bust or statue of Martin Luther King, Jr. which will be placed in suitable location in the Capitol as determined by the Committee. Stipulates that not more than $2,500 shall be paid out of the contingent fund of the House of Representatives to carry out this resolution.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution authorizing a bust or statue of Martin Luther King, Jr., to be placed in the Capitol.
